headline: Evergy Schedules Conference Call to Discuss 3rd Quarter Results
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., October 16, 2025--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) announced today it will release its 2025 third quarter earnings Thursday, November 6, 2025, before market open. The company plans to host its quarterly conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results Thursday, November 6, 2025.
